MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Moss Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  6:33PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8:45PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at  6:40PM on 30th November 2020
